Headline: #124 Navy Pier Temporary Reroute near State/Washington
ShortDescription: 124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/ Washington, due to a festival near State/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/ Washington, due to a festival near State/Washington.

Westbound buses will operate via Grand, State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker, State and over regular route.

Eastbound buses will operate via Washington, State, Wacker, Dearborn, Illinois, Columbia and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
